EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to join the Britcham Golf Tournament 2012, Oct 26
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Regarding the previous email that The British Chamber of Commerce is inviting you to attend Golf Tournament on Friday 26th October at Qingyuan Lion Lake Sheraton Golf Club. Please follow the link for more information.
Kind regards,
The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Member of The British Schools Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International School of South East Asia - Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
